title: IPO list not loading?
body: PLEASE IGNORE IF YOU CAN SEE THE IPO LIST. Hi, we apologize for the inconvenience caused. During the backend update on April 6th at 3:00 PM IST, there was an issue that may have resulted in an incorrect IPO list being sent to the app. As a result, you may need to clear the app's data from your phone settings and re-add your PANs. We understand this may be inconvenient and apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your understanding!
